name: CryptoGamez
description: CryptoGamez is upping the ante for all crypto enthusiasts with a unique business model that will change the way we game. We have combined blockchain and the model of fantasy games and make trading more rewarding. Under this model, traders join the platform and make their own team of participants. In a fantasy style game, you bet on real-life games and players. Here, you bet on the cryptocurrencies of your choice and earn by predicting their prices and next moves.
